name: Relic Tomb
description:
You've just managed to sneak into the  ancient tomb full of precious relics . If you can get out of here without losing all your treasures, you'll become rich. But be careful, who knows if the tomb is cursed?

How to play?

- WASD to move

- Space to jump, double space for bunny hop

-Press E to use artefact

- Left click to attack
